channel.title: Comments on: Diversity Statement added to the Libraryâ€™s Web Pages

item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/12/05/diversity-statement-added-to-the-librarys-web-pages/#comment-774">Alan Daniel</a>.
Thanks Alan. Great suggestion. The workgroup does want to provide information about resources, especially for Library staff. One of our stated goals is to "Share library and campus resources." The ODO's website http://diversity.ucsf.edu/ maintains links to a lot of resources. So I imagine we will make heavy use of their efforts.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alan Daniel.

Thanks Alan. Great suggestion. The workgroup does want to provide information about resources, especially for Library staff. One of our stated goals is to “Share library and campus resources.” The ODO’s website http://diversity.ucsf.edu/ maintains links to a lot of resources. So I imagine we will make heavy use of their efforts.

item.title: By: Alan Daniel
item.dc:creator: Alan Daniel
item.description: What about linking to some resources, as example: http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/contacts/title-ix-resources.html
item.content:encoded: What about linking to some resources, as example: http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/contacts/title-ix-resources.html
